document.heading: Home Purchase Assistance Fund Act of 1978

history.narrative: Law 2-103, the “Home Purchase Assistance Fund Act of 1978,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-316, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Urban Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 13, 1978, and June 27, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 1, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-214 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
